The evaluation of using different types of energy
Group presentation, cooperation with my groupmates
Energy related knowledge and quantitative approach of comparing different energy sources. Multidisciplinary way to analyze and access different energy types.
The basic knowledge related to energy. We got a thorough perception about the global energy use situation and future.
The knowledge of energy, the skills for group presentation, the insights of working on a science  problem.

I learnt about the basic knowledge of energy and resources. This course led me into the area of science, technologies and the environment. When I see some energy structures in the real life, I will remember the things that the professor taught me in the classes.

I gained the basic knowledge and facts about energy and environment. I learnt about how to find the data I need while finishing my homework and preparing for my presentation. This course also helped me to remember some knowledge of high school physics.
the basic knowledge about the energy and power.
I learned the basic idea of environmental concern and several ways to fix the current problems
I learned multiple environmental issues and possible ways to resolve them; I also realized the rational way to deal with current environmental issues, and how should we face these problems.
This could be more professional

It is suitable for us.

Something I like about the course is that it combined physics with social science and that it's friendly to non-science major students. Also, the textbook is impressive and well writen. The course could be better if there is a course outline letting us know what we are going to learn in the whole semester.
the course is very interesting.
Everything is fine, especially the field trip, which really strengthens our understanding of the forefront of environmental science.

This course contains a lot of information and knowledge specific to environmental physics, which is informative and useful. The content of this course is not so hard, so the pace of the course is slow in some degree.
Yes! This course integrate a multidisciplinary way to access different energy type. Through field trips, we are able to broaden our knowledge in the field of Applied Physics.
Yes, many of the knowledge taught can be regarded as common sense that people would usually neglect, which is good to know
I would because it is a good course to start a science journey and couldn't be boring.
Yes, this is interesting for people who wants to learn the basic things about science.
Yes, because Professor can explain the concept with real-life events, he is also good at answering the questions.
Yes. Humans really have a big impact on the environment. Arousing the awareness of the environmental problem can prompt people to make the world a better place.
